description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
New Features

NETWORKNET-31808
Create Bayes email analyzer(spam checker)
	
Enhancements

NETWORKNET-34438 
Create/Update/Delete Gmail Contact
NETWORKNET-34442 
EML to PST conversion causes large size PST creation
NETWORKNET-34492 
Filter mails with Date and Time using Pop3Client via MailQuery

Bugs

NETWORKNET-34467 
Inline images are lost while converting MapiMessage -> MailMessage
NETWORKNET-34472 
Setting Exchange Format address in To field gives error
NETWORKNET-34476 
Text alignment inverted while reading/writing to Appointment object
NETWORKNET-34479 
Calendar view disappears while loading/saving image
NETWORKNET-34480 
Appointment time changes while loading and saving the ICS file
NETWORKNET-34482 
Appointment saved using Aspose.Email doesn't shown time in local timezone
NETWORKNET-34485 
Loading ICS with Aspose raises Error in Visual Studio
NETWORKNET-34488 
Saving TNEF Calendar as EML loses the "Required" field
NETWORKNET-34496 
MailMessage.Save interchanges content of the message body
NETWORKNET-34498 
MSG to MHTML: Encoding issue
NETWORKNET-34456 
IEWSClient.UpdateContact() raises exception ErrorInvalidIdMalformed, MessageText: Id is malformed.
NETWORKNET-34474 
"The mail header is malformed" exception raised while using IEWSClient.FetchMessage()
NETWORKNET-34486 
MapiMessage.FromMailMessage raises exception
NETWORKNET-34487 
MapiMessage to MailMessage raises NullReferenceException
NETWORKNET-34490 
"Object reference not set to an instance of an object" exception raised while loading the MPP in AE .NET
NETWORKNET-34495 
Resaving EML as EML raises ArgumentOutOfRangeException
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
